entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
